fr.umlv.jphoto.cela.model
Class JphotoAdaptaterListModel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractListModel
      fr.umlv.jphoto.cela.model.JphotoAdaptaterListModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.ListModel
public class JphotoAdaptaterListModel
extends javax.swing.AbstractListModel

Bridge of ListModel which manage the picture of a Directory. This model contains an ArrayList of Picture where we store pictures or transitions that we found.

Author:
cfodouop
See Also:

scanList

public void scanList()
Start the scan to display pictures. This method creates and initializes a Thread to start the scan and set currentThread with ID of the thread and then start it.
